column2: Standard Bearer carries the banner of his liege in battle and in court ceremonies.
Captain of the Guard is honored with leading and organizing the personal guard of his liege.
Court Scribe office has the entrusted with the responsibility of keeping the records for the realm.
Court Engineer has the honorable responsibility of building defenses and siege machines for his liege.
Fairest Maiden is the most alluring woman of the realm.
Royal Mistress is the most adored of the liege's concubines.
Court Witcher is responsible for hunting the monsters in service of his master.
Court Bard is an performer most skilled in verses and poems responsible for the entertainment of the court.
